test_cases.objective: Ensure that the LIMS installation process sets up all required modules correctly.

test_steps.action: Run the LIMS installer and follow the provided setup instructions.
test_steps.expected_result: All system components are installed without errors.

acceptance_criteria: System installs all components successfully
No error messages during installation
data_integrity_requirements: Installation logs must be preserved and auditable.
urs_requirements: Installation process as defined in URS section 1.1

test_cases.objective: Validate that the sample registration, tracking, and chain of custody functions operate as specified.

test_steps.action: Enter new sample data in the system and assign a barcode.
test_steps.expected_result: Sample is registered with unique barcode and appears in the tracking system.

acceptance_criteria: Sample registration functions correctly
Chain of custody is accurately logged
data_integrity_requirements: Audit trail of sample events must be complete and secure.
urs_requirements: Sample management specifications as outlined in URS section 2.1

test_cases.objective: Assess system performance under load to verify response time is maintained for concurrent users.

test_steps.action: Simulate 200 concurrent users performing standard operations.
test_steps.expected_result: System responds in under 2 seconds for critical operations.

acceptance_criteria: Under peak load, response times are within specified limits
No system crashes occur during load test
data_integrity_requirements: Performance logs must be retained for audit purposes.
urs_requirements: Performance criteria outlined in URS section 3.3

test_cases.test_name: LIMS Security and Access Control Test
test_cases.objective: Verify that user authentication and access controls comply with regulatory and internal standards.

test_steps.action: Attempt login with valid and invalid credentials and perform role-based access tests.
test_steps.expected_result: User is granted appropriate access when credentials are valid; access is denied when invalid.

acceptance_criteria: All access attempts are correctly managed
Audit trails capture login and access details accurately
data_integrity_requirements: All security logs must be tamper-evident.
urs_requirements: Security requirements as detailed in URS section 4.2

test_cases.test_name: LIMS Data Integrity and Audit Trail Assessment
test_cases.objective: Confirm that system data integrity and audit trail mechanisms conform to ALCOA+ standards.

test_steps.action: Perform a series of data modifications and review the corresponding audit logs.
test_steps.expected_result: Every data change is accurately logged with user, timestamp, and action details.

acceptance_criteria: Audit log entries are complete and unaltered
Data integrity controls meet ALCOA+ standards
data_integrity_requirements: All audit trails must be immutable and retrievable.
urs_requirements: Data integrity requirements as specified in URS section 4.3

test_cases.objective: Validate that the LIMS correctly exchanges data with the ERP system in real time.

test_steps.action: Trigger a sample status update and verify that ERP receives the update.
test_steps.expected_result: Data exchange occurs seamlessly with matching records on both systems.

acceptance_criteria: Data transmitted successfully between systems
No discrepancies detected in data synchronization
data_integrity_requirements: Data transferred must be validated for accuracy and consistency.
urs_requirements: Integration requirements as detailed in URS section 5.2

test_cases.objective: Ensure that test method workflows, including SOP integration and approval gates, function as per specifications.

test_steps.action: Execute a test method workflow and validate the approval process at each stage.
test_steps.expected_result: Workflow progresses smoothly with all approvals correctly recorded.

acceptance_criteria: All test method steps complete with valid electronic signatures
Workflow approvals are logged accurately
data_integrity_requirements: Approval logs and electronic signatures must be verifiable.
urs_requirements: Test method management requirements as specified in URS section 2.2

test_cases.test_name: LIMS Performance Data Retrieval Speed Test
test_cases.objective: Measure the speed of data retrieval operations to ensure system responsiveness under typical load.

test_steps.action: Execute multiple queries to retrieve sample and test data concurrently.
test_steps.expected_result: All queries return results in less than 2 seconds.

acceptance_criteria: Response times for all queries are within performance targets
No impact on data integrity under load
data_integrity_requirements: Data retrieval must not compromise data consistency.
urs_requirements: Performance requirements as stated in URS section 3.4

test_cases.objective: Verify that the electronic signature functionality is secure and meets regulatory compliance criteria.
prerequisites: User accounts with electronic signature permissions
Security settings configured as per guidelines

test_steps.action: Submit a transaction requiring an electronic signature using a valid user account.
test_steps.expected_result: Electronic signature is recorded with proper metadata and timestamp.

acceptance_criteria: Electronic signature entries are complete and compliant
Audit logs are generated for each signed transaction
data_integrity_requirements: Electronic signature records must be immutable and traceable.
urs_requirements: Security and electronic signature requirements as specified in URS section 4.1

test_cases.test_name: LIMS Data Integrity Backup and Recovery Test
test_cases.objective: Test the backup and recovery process to guarantee data integrity in case of system failure.
prerequisites: Test data loaded in the database

test_steps.action: Perform a full system backup followed by a simulated data restoration process.
test_steps.expected_result: Data is restored accurately with complete audit trails intact.

acceptance_criteria: Restored data matches pre-backup state
Audit trails remain complete and unaltered
data_integrity_requirements: Backup and recovery logs must be securely archived.
urs_requirements: Data backup requirements as defined in URS section 6.1

test_cases.test_name: Verify LIMS Installation on New Server
test_cases.objective: Confirm that the LIMS software installs correctly and configures system services as specified in the URS.

test_steps.action: Execute the installation script on the designated server.
test_steps.expected_result: Installation completes with all components correctly deployed and logged.

acceptance_criteria: All components must be installed without errors as per documentation.
data_integrity_requirements: Audit trail logs must capture installation events.
urs_requirements: Installation must comply with URS system setup specifications.

test_cases.objective: Ensure that the system accurately registers samples and maintains complete chain-of-custody records as required.

test_steps.action: Register a sample using the barcode scanning feature.
test_steps.expected_result: Sample is successfully registered and traceable with a complete audit trail.

acceptance_criteria: Sample registration succeeds without errors and audit trail entries are verified.
data_integrity_requirements: All sample data must be accurately attributed and timestamped.
urs_requirements: Sample management functionality as outlined in the URS.

test_cases.test_name: System Response Under Peak Load Conditions
test_cases.objective: Validate system performance under peak load conditions by simulating multiple concurrent user operations.
prerequisites: Test environment set up with simulated concurrent users

test_steps.action: Simulate 200 concurrent user transactions and execute critical operations.
test_steps.expected_result: Response time remains under 2 seconds with no transaction failures.

acceptance_criteria: Performance metrics meet the specified criteria under load.
data_integrity_requirements: Data consistency must be maintained under load stress.
urs_requirements: Performance criteria as defined in the URS must be met.

test_cases.objective: Ensure that the system's electronic signature functionality meets security requirements and accurately logs all signature events.
prerequisites: User accounts with digital certificates configured

test_steps.action: Attempt to sign records using both valid and invalid credentials.
test_steps.expected_result: Valid signatures are accepted and invalid attempts are rejected with proper audit logging.

acceptance_criteria: Electronic signature functionality must comply with security and regulatory guidelines.
data_integrity_requirements: All signature events must be non-repudiable and fully logged.
urs_requirements: The system must implement electronic signature features as per URS.

test_cases.objective: Confirm that audit trails capture all user actions with accurate timestamps and required details.
prerequisites: Audit logging is enabled on the system

test_steps.action: Perform a series of transactions and review the generated audit logs.
test_steps.expected_result: Audit logs display correct entries with timestamps, user IDs, and actions.

acceptance_criteria: Audit log entries must be complete and unaltered as per regulatory requirements.
data_integrity_requirements: Audit data must be non-repudiable and secure.
urs_requirements: Audit trail capabilities as specified in the URS must be validated.

test_cases.objective: Verify the real-time data exchange between LIMS and the MES system to ensure accurate and timely data transmission.
prerequisites: MES system configured in test mode

test_steps.action: Send sample data from LIMS to MES and monitor the data reception.
test_steps.expected_result: Data is transmitted accurately and reflected in the MES system with correct logging.

acceptance_criteria: Data exchange must meet required accuracy and timing criteria.
data_integrity_requirements: Data must remain unaltered during transmission.
urs_requirements: Integration with MES must comply with URS requirements.

test_cases.test_name: Analytical Method Validation and Transfer Testing
test_cases.objective: Ensure that analytical test methods are validated and transferable within the LIMS workflow as defined by the URS.
prerequisites: Standard operating procedures and validated methods are uploaded

test_steps.action: Execute a predefined test method for sample analysis and capture results.
test_steps.expected_result: Test results match method specifications and trigger an approval workflow.

acceptance_criteria: Method execution and transfer must meet validation criteria.
data_integrity_requirements: Test method data must be stored with full traceability.
urs_requirements: Analytical method management as specified in the URS must be confirmed.

test_cases.objective: Evaluate system performance during the batch release process to ensure response times meet requirements.
prerequisites: Batch release data loaded in a production simulation environment

test_steps.action: Initiate the batch release process while monitoring system load and response times.
test_steps.expected_result: Batch release completes within specified performance parameters with response times under 2 seconds.

acceptance_criteria: Performance during batch release must comply with defined system criteria.
data_integrity_requirements: Changes to batch data must be logged with full traceability.
urs_requirements: Quality control and batch release features as outlined in the URS must be verified.

test_cases.test_name: User Access Control and Privilege Validation
test_cases.objective: Assess the robustness of user access controls and validate that privileges are correctly enforced.
prerequisites: Multiple user roles with distinct privileges are configured

test_steps.action: Perform operations using users with different roles and validate access restrictions.
test_steps.expected_result: Unauthorized actions are blocked and all access attempts are logged appropriately.

acceptance_criteria: User access controls must strictly enforce privilege boundaries.
data_integrity_requirements: Access control modifications must be immediately reflected in the audit log.
urs_requirements: User access management requirements as detailed in the URS must be met.

test_cases.objective: Verify that the system detects and prevents unauthorized attempts to alter finalized electronic records.
prerequisites: Electronic record module is active with audit logging enabled

test_steps.action: Attempt unauthorized modifications to a finalized record and monitor system alerts.
test_steps.expected_result: System prevents alterations, registers an alert, and logs the attempt in the audit trail.

acceptance_criteria: Any unauthorized record change must be blocked and fully logged.
data_integrity_requirements: Finalized records must be immutable with complete audit tracking.
urs_requirements: Data integrity controls for electronic records as specified in the URS must be validated.
